titleStmt.title: Laban T. Moore to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12019

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 81, Folder 68th Regiment 1863-1866 Commissions and Oaths

body.p:
Catlettsburg Ky
Oct 26th 1863.
Gov Bramlett
Sir

Captain Thomas McKinster of Lawrence County desires to be commissioned to organize the Malitia of this County. I think he will make an efficient officer, if it is given aim please corespond with him at Louisa Lawrence County Ky --

I am your obedient Servt
Laban T Moore

Thomas. McKinster Colonel 62 Infy Regt
Novr 5. 1863
1. 2. 3. 4.

Lawrence Coty
Col. Thos McKinster
(68 Regt)
Com issd & forwd
Novr 5. 1863

Issue
Commission
& send Copy of Com and file of orders
D W Lindsey
